items.sentence: There are some people who sleep in the daytime and work at night.
Tom and Mary named their first daughter after Tom\'s grandmother.
My office is on the fourth floor of that gray six-story building.
Tom doesn\'t see anything wrong with letting Mary learn to drive.
Tom has done nothing all week but complain about Mary\'s cooking.
Tom has lied to me too many times, so I don\'t trust him anymore.
Tom hopes you understand why he can\'t take part in your protest.
Tom is always complaining that he doesn\'t have enough free time.
I hope that neither of them was involved in the traffic accident.
Mary started plucking her eyebrows when she was twelve years old.
